text: Ivan Blaće (born 1 July 1984) is a Croatian former professional basketball player. ==Personal life== He was born in Šibenik in July 1984. In 2017, he married Croatian model Maja Spahija. ==References== ==External links== *Ivan Blaće at realgm.com Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian men's basketball players Category:GKK Šibenik players Category:People from Šibenik Category:Forwards (basketball)
title: Ivan Blaće
